mapper.insert: /* DclzManageMapper.insertDclzManage */ INSERT INTO TB_PS_EMPLOYEE_COMMUTE ( STORE_CD, EMP_NO, POS_NO, SALE_DATE, COMMUTE_IN_DT, COMMUTE_OUT_DT, IN_FG, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{empNo}, #{posNo}, #{saleDate}, #{commuteInDt}, #{commuteOutDt}, #{inFg}, #{remark}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* DclzManageMapper.selectDclzManageDtl */ SELECT tpec.STORE_CD, tpec.SALE_DATE, tpec.EMP_NO, tme.EMP_NM, tpec.COMMUTE_IN_DT, tpec.COMMUTE_OUT_DT, tpec.IN_FG, tpec.REMARK FROM TB_PS_EMPLOYEE_COMMUTE tpec, TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme WHERE tpec.STORE_CD = tme.STORE_CD AND tpec.EMP_NO = tme.EMP_NO AND tpec.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tpec.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND tpec.SALE_DATE = replace(#{saleDate},'-','')
